title: Blended MOOC-Based Social Project Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Social Science Concepts and Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Conducting projects to solve social issues in blended learning environments utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can investigate three or more real-world cases using the social issue analysis model provided by the MOOC platform.
Learners can improve PBL outcomes two or more times through peer assessment and feedback in a blended learning environment.
Learners can develop actionable project plans for solving community issues using digital collaboration tools.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
